issue.title: [CF 678] Additional support for Instance Type condition
issue.body:
The available values for "Instance Type" condition have not yet included 5-man Challenge Mode. It could be useful for users using special icons or groups for Challenge Mode. This feature can only be achieved by lua condition GetInstanceDifficulty() == 9 now.


> Posted by CurseForge user Tellaurea | Imported from CurseForge issue #678 | Raw

comments.body:
Added this in r634, and fixed some major issues that were affecting that condition as well.

Edited Nov 2, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
